ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Part XLlX — Qualified Investments)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (PART XLIX - QUALIFIED INVESTMENTS) in order to include shares of a Canadian corporation that is registered as a community economic-development business under Prince Edward Island’s Community Economic Development Equity Tax Credit Act.
